ozmod

クラス MODPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ozmod.MODPlayer
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MODPlayer
extends java.lang.Thread
    A Class to replay MOD file.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

        public MODPlayer()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        オーバーライド:
        finalize クラス内 java.lang.Object

      • load

        public OZMod.ERR load(PipeIn _input)
        Loads the MOD.
        パラメータ:
        _input - An instance to a PipeIn Class to read data from disk or URL.
        戻り値:
        NOERR if no error occured.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float _vol)

      • setPanPower

        public void setPanPower(float _p)

      • run

        public void run()
        Never call this method directly. Use play() instead.
        定義:
        run インタフェース内 java.lang.Runnable
        オーバーライド:
        run クラス内 java.lang.Thread

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts to play the MOD. The time latency between a note is read and then heard is approximatively of 100ms. If the MOD is not loopable and finish, you cannot restart it by invoking again this method.

      • done

        public void done()
        Stops the MOD. Once a MOD is stopped, it cannot be restarted.

      • getCurrentPos

        public int getCurrentPos()
        Gets the current reading position of the song.
        戻り値:
        The current position.

      • getCurrentRow

        public int getCurrentRow()
        Gets the current reading row of the song.
        戻り値:
        The current row.

      • getMixBuffer

        public byte[] getMixBuffer()
        Gets the internal buffer used to mix the samples together. It can be used for instance to analyze the wave, apply effect or whatever.
        戻り値:
        The internal mix buffer.

      • isLoopable

        public boolean isLoopable()
        Tells if the MOD is loopable or not.
        戻り値:
        true if loopable, false otherwhise.

      • setLoopable

        public void setLoopable(boolean _b)
        Sets the MOD loopable or not. The method can be called at any time if the song is still playing.
        パラメータ:
        _b - true to loop the song, false otherwhise.
